summary: [Blocked 2025-10-08] Hold until backlog health + repo anatomy receipts expose subsystem gaps worth a bespoke dashboard; next receipt: rerun backlog synth under _report/autonomy/backlog-synth/ confirming the gap.

steps.title: Catalog TEOF subsystems and receipts
steps.notes: Document core components (validator, autonomy loop, planner, memory, bus, docs) with links to receipts/tests

steps.title: Design health metrics
steps.notes: Define per-subsystem checks (last receipt, failing tests, unused components, warnings)

steps.title: Implement anatomy CLI/doctor extensions
steps.notes: Ship teof anatomy/doctor subcommands that report subsystem status

steps.title: Document usage and integrate into workflow
steps.notes: Update docs/quickstart + workflow with anatomy checks and add tests

checkpoint.description: Anatomy dashboard reports health of all subsystems with observable metrics
